data.name: TestMustHaveAMethod
data.value: The test must specify a test method.

data.name: MethodMustHaveAnAssembly
data.value: The test method must be inside a compiled assembly.

data.name: AssemblyMustBeDecoratedWithScreenplay
data.value: All test methods decorated with `{0}' must be contained within assemblies which are decorated with `{1}'.

data.name: TestMustHaveAScenarioInProperties
data.value: The test must contain an instance of `0' in its test properties.
